oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Louise Scruggs to Charles Shelton
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Scruggs, Louise, 1927-2006;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed letter from Louise Scruggs to Charles Shelton informing Charles that she is attaching a photo of the Earl Scruggs Revue because she would like the newer photo to be used on any upcoming posters. She also informs Charles that they change their publicity photos about every six months and to let her know if Hatch receives anymore calls for posters with Earl's name on them.
